title: Tassel, 1951-105-1-b
description: Each has four large tassels hanging from lattice arrangement of thick plaited silk cords, clasped by three large decorated rosettes half way up and by two smaller ones at the top. Tassels (20 cm long) have deep tops with tufting border and silk lattice over silver thread wound on woven core. Pink silk; silver; silver metal threads.
